subject: packaging: Bump to version 4.0
commitMessage:
packaging: Bump to version 4.0

Also clean spec file.
skip:

a0fb350... slow down parallelism
d2eb63b... disbale broken tests
d14a27f... savannah bug30723: expand makeflags beforereexec
31cbc49... savannah bug30612: handling of archives
2cf9bde... fix whitespace tokenization
c6884ac... make glob faster
28ebed0... parallel build
d1e2846... Fix missing definition of PAGE_SIZE

Change-Id: I14942b05d84c008e42dc1c14f82f81ed5faef472
Bug-Tizen: TC-1851
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>
Signed-off-by: Philippe Coval <philippe.coval@open.eurogiciel.org>

Use %reconfigure for correct configuring.

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(1 comment)
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

I am granted to merge this if needed ... 

waiting the verif bit

Patch Set 2: Verified+1

The patch does not break build for armv7l and i586 and allows build for aarch64 (see https://build.tizen.org/package/show?package=make&project=devel%3Aarm_toolchain%3AMobile%3Atest)

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

ok I merge it , please ask me or assign me a bug if need it to be submited too
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
